main event: Three distinct lights were sighted over Augustine Island, Alaska, which ascended, hovered, descended rapidly, and then disappeared.
interesting points: The lights were slightly larger than a bright star., The observation lasted 3-4 minutes., The object changed direction before departing at a fast rate., The report was received shortly after the sighting on 3/25/54., Witnesses believed it was initially an aircraft navigation light.
sighted object: three distinct lights in the sky
witness description: a pilot from Northern Consolidated Airlines
